name: Disc Room
summary: Are you ready to get sliced in half? The year is 2089 and a giant disc has appeared in orbit of Jupiter. Step into the oversized space suit of a brave scientist and explore this sprawling intergalactic slaughterhouse.
info:
• 发行: Devolver Digital
  • 平台: PC
  • 平台: Nintendo Switch
  • 游戏类型: ACT
  • 游玩人数: 1人
  • 发行日期: 2020-10-22
  • 官方网站: http://www.discroom.com
  • 开发: Terri , Dose , Kitty , JW
